title: Living in the UK: have you been made unemployed during the pandemic?
description:
We would like to hear from those who have lost their jobs due to coronavirus

The rate of unemployment in the UK rose to 4.9% in the three months up to October, fuelled by job losses in retail and hospitality, latest government figures show.

We would like to hear from people who have lost their jobs as a result of coronavirus.

Continue reading...
